name: MediaWiki floating Vector skin
description: Tired of having to scroll to the very top of a long wiki page? Well, look no more! This extension makes all parts of the interface float on the screen all the time so you don't have to scroll to the top.
additional_info: Note: There are a lot of mediawiki sites so it's impossible to list them all but the CSS only applies when the body element has the classes 'mediawiki' and 'skin-vector'.
